content: I graduated from IIIT Bangalore with an Integrated Masters (Btech + Mtech) degree in Information Technology. During my thesis, I had worked on developing a framework for Automated Mapping and Navigation Assistant using natural language instructions for indoor environments. I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. G Srinivasa Raghavan

title: Likhitha Surapaneni
